description.en-US: Configure your browser with the Quick Live News & Custom Web Search extension for access to business news, coverage on sports, science & entertainment, and customized web search. Stay informed: Get timely updates on major issues and the latest events. Personalize your feed: Select topics of interest and your preferred news sources. Scroll down to read the news: Get latest news updates & access saved articles. Access trending news: Catch up on news that’s trending all around the world. Find relevant results: Enjoy convenient access to Yahoo!® search. Here’s how we intend to use the data collected by our add-on: 1. IP address information: Every time you use our add-on, we receive information about your IP address that we use only for analytics & reporting. We collect your IP address when you use the news related tool offered by our extension. We anonymise your IP address and do not trace it back to you, we only use it for analytics and reporting.You have the option to not share this information; however, doing that restricts our ability to provide you all of the extensions features. 2. Information shared explicitly with us: We collect your inputs including selected news providers and news categories to provide user preferred results through the news tool offered on our Extension.We may collect personal information provided by you, such as your name, email address, and telephone number, as a part of feedback forms. You can be assured that this information is used ONLY to respond to your queries and concerns. It is not shared with third parties. 3.Technical data: The add-on collects technical information such as domain name and user agent that helps in the planning of product upgrades, fraud detection and statistical analysis purposes.. This data cannot be used to identify users. This product can be uninstalled at any time. Please share any suggestions for improvement with us. You confirm you have read and understood the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy, agree to abide by them, and to the installation of this extension on clicking the button above. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Privacy Policy - https://quicklivenews.com/news/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms & Conditions - https://quicklivenews.com/news/termsofservice_ff.html

name.en-US: Quick Live News & Custom Web Search

summary.en-US: Install the Quick Live News & Custom Web Search extension and click the icon on the toolbar to access top news stories & customized web search from your browser
